title: No
detail: The patient did not have to wait, and was seen immediately by a nurse upon presenting at the hospital
help: additional help or links related to the item

title: Yes (less than 30 mins wait)
detail: The patient had to wait, and was seen within 30 minutes of presenting at the hospital
help: additional help or links related to the item

title: Yes (more than 30 mins wait)
detail: The patient had to wait for at least 30 minutes after presenting at the hospital before they were triaged by a nurse
help: additional help or links related to the item
